title: !!! - Discontinued ___SAMBUCUS Elderberry Lung Therapy Detox Pills - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Breathe easier and support your respiratory health with New Lung® SAMBUCUS Elderberry Lung Therapy Detox Pills. Our advanced formula combines the immune-boosting power of European Elderberry Extract with natural herbs like mullein and marshmallow root, promoting effective lung detoxification and overall respiratory wellness. Key Benefits:
  • Supports Respiratory Health: Cleanses and protects your lungs, ideal for those exposed to pollutants.
  • Promotes Lung Detoxification: Synergistic blend detoxifies lungs, removing harmful toxins.
  • Boosts Immune Function: Elderberry fortifies your body’s natural defenses.
  • Natural Ingredients: High-quality, free from artificial additives and common allergens.
  • Easy to Use: 60 easy-to-swallow capsules for a one-month supply.
Key Ingredients:
  • European Elderberry Extract (600mg): Antioxidant-rich, supports lung health.
  • Mullein (Verbascum thapsus): Reduces respiratory inflammation and aids mucus clearance.
  • Marshmallow Root (Althaea officinalis): Soothes mucous membranes, promoting lung health.
Experience the benefits of New Lung® SAMBUCUS Elderberry Lung Therapy and enhance your respiratory health today!
Invest in your respiratory health with New Lung® SAMBUCUS Elderberry Lung Therapy Detox Pills. Our advanced formula provides the essential support your lungs need to cleanse and detoxify from harmful environmental pollutants. Experience the benefits of natural ingredients designed to promote lung health and overall well-being.

supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Calories 10
Total Carbohydrate 2 g <1%
Sambucus nigra (Elderberry) Fruit Extract 500 mg **
(Standardized to 25% Anthocyanins)
Vitamin C (as Ascorbic Acid) 200 mg 222%
Zinc (as Zinc Gluconate) 15 mg 136%
Echinacea purpurea Extract 200 mg **
(4% Phenolics)

** Daily Value (DV) not established

Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet.

Other Ingredients: Vegetable Cellulose (Vegetable Capsule), Rice Flour, Magnesium Stearate (vegetable source), Silicon Dioxide.
